To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Performances and discussions by Ashley Campbell, Abby Anderson, Bailey Bryan, Alyssa Bonagurua and Ruby Stewart aka the Sisterhood Band and Cassadee Pope from the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Program hosted by CMT executive Leslie Fram.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
